entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as dominating the scene, wearing a helmet and goggles, and sitting astride an enormous motorbike with a black sidecar attached. He is also mentioned as saying 'All righ', Harry? Ready fer the o'?

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as hurtling into their midst and being greeted by others with a general cry of greeting. He is also mentioned as saying 'Deﬁnitely', but I wasn't expecting this many of you!'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as ﬂung her arms around Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as clapping Harry on the back.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is described as holding two enormous, bulging sacks and whose magical eye was spinning from darkening sky to house to garden with dizzying rapidity.

relationships.description: Hagrid said 'All righ', Harry? Ready fer the o'?
Hermione ﬂung her arms around Harry.
Ron clapped Harry on the back.
Mad-Eye said 'Let's get undercover before we talk you through it'.
